main event: A round silver object, about the size of a pinhead, was observed descending at dusk in Saudi Arabia on November 27, 1953.
interesting points: The object appeared to move at a rate of 1.75 degrees per second., The object was described as being round and flat with one side reflective., The sighting lasted for approximately two seconds., There were no physical evidence or photographs available., The conclusion of the report stated 'insufficient data for evaluation.'
